full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Liquid Chromatograph and Mass Spectrometer

## Notice Details

* **Title (English)**: Liquid Chromatograph and Mass Spectrometer
* **Title (French)**: Chromatographie Liquide et Spectromètre de Masse
* **Reference Number**: WS4104585878-Doc4113064725
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4104585878

## Tender Information

* **Publication Date**: July 24, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 8, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 7, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: No end date specified

## Tender Status

* **Tender Status (English)**: Expired
* **Tender Status (French)**: Expiré

## Related Information

* **UNSPSC Code**: *Spectroscopic Equipment (41115400)
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to various trade agreements, including the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Procurement Method**: Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Limited Tendering Reason**: Exclusive Rights

## Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name (English)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Name (French)**: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## End-User Entity

* **End User Entity Name (English)**: Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
* **End User Entity Name (French)**: Agence des services frontaliers du Canada (ASFC)
* **End User Entity Address**: 333 North River Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1L 8B9, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Robert Courteau (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: robert.courteau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL

* **Notice URL (English)**: http://
